django-simple-blog
==================

A simple blogging app for django.

Installation and setup
----------------------
1. pip install django-blogger
2. Configure Django
  * a
  * b
Features
--------

* RSS Feed 
* Markdown 
* Twitter Bootstrap UI
* Tags 
* Multiple Authors
* Archive 
* Comments
* Administration is done through auto generated admin

Planned Additions
-----------------
* read/write API
